thought: I need to craft 6 polished_blackstone_slab. To do that I need to craft 4 polished_blackstone, which requires placing 4 blackstone side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the blackstone from slot 23 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1
